* Snow Tech runs back into the bush with some of the alien bots on his tail. 
Huffing and puffing, he dives into a stand of trees in front of him, landing 
on his face with his butt in the air, over his head. He groans into the dirt 
he has piled up with his face and passes out.*

*The alien bots run past Snow Tech's corpse of trees that he is passed out 
in. They search for him through the bush, but do not find him.Since anger 
and frustration is not built into their emotion chips, they continue to look 
undonted, but they start to look farther and farther away, till they are too 
far away to be seen.....*

* The black Piff ball was still falling towards Dinobot. He did not make a 
sound because he left it behind long ago, so Dinobot would be unable to hear 
him.............*
